template.name: Field Oriented Control
template.description: Shows how to use FOC functions with an AXI4-Stream.

template.name: Field Oriented Control with Web UI
template.description:
FOC server program implementing the Network API and a Web Server.
Important: Add library 'dl' to the linker flags! In Xilinx SDx: Right click on the project -> C/C++ Build Settings -> SDS++ Linker -> Libraries
